column3:
“Dream Star, THC 24.06%, Leafly, 04-07-17
I bought 1/2 oz. of this about 2 weeks ago, along with a tiny and highly over-rated CBD water pipe that I paid $100 for. I've since smoked about 1/8 oz. and down-graded" to a full-size $30 no-name glass bong that is far superior to the CBD piece
column4: and I am still stunned by and a bit apprehensive of the potency of this strain. Ice & water Dream Star bong-hits deliver a head rus...”"

column3: “The smoke goes straight to your head and lasts around 20 mins. After that, the high goes from your head and into your body which gives it a nice floaty" feeling. Highly recommended for all you canna-nerds.”"
“There was a reason this was a top shelf bud, it hits amazingly and drifts you into bliss within the first minute. One of my top five strains! LOVE this stuff!”
“One of my favorite happy" strains. Really nice uplifting high. Very stimulating. Nice dense buds from the local dispensary.”"

“I picked up a cyber monday $6 Dream Star pre roll at a local dispensary and instead of smoking the joint i emptied and have many small 3 hit bowls. I smoke Blue Dream regularly and enjoy it so I really wasn’t expecting a noticeable difference but there was!  

For a hybrid Dream Stars effects are full sativa easing into the indica after a while. If you like sativa heavy hybrids this ones effects you will enjoy. It is...”
“A full euphoric, thought-provoking, stress-busting kinda high with super smooth flavor. My shatter was from Ballpark Dispensary in Denver, Co”
“Euphoric as fu**! I lterally feel stress dissolve and get replaced w good vibes. great for hanging w friends or giving to music.”
“Potent sativa head high, very trippy and head centered”
“njv”
“Amazing bud, strong smell, strong long lasting effects without being to much.”

“Treats PTSD,anxiety and depression like no other! Doesn't give you the anxious feelings at all. Taste and smells super sweet,,, the blueberry haze really stands out! Gives you energy to get things done! No couch lock at all”
“The flavor profile with the Live Resin is spot on, my girlfriend thinks it tastes like peaches, let's try it again.”
“wow this strain has it all from smell to taste to uplifting effects in seconds. this is a very potent strain with excellent results. 4 out of 5 as to feeling mild paranoia.”
“A nice euphoric energy that makes everything enjoyable. It has very therapeutic effects for stress, depression, migraines, and pain.”
“Top 3 best strains for me! Taste of berry haze is amazing! Affordable!”

“Founds this to be like an extra strength version of Blue Dream. Very cerebral and uplifting. Great daytime option, makes me feel lighter and motivated, although a little spaced out. Really nice sweet berry scent with an undertone of Diesel-type scent. 4.5/5.”
“My current favorite. Some heavy couch lock but great feelings and ideas flow with this one.”
“I don't find the wax as entertaining as the flower itself. It helps with nausea nonetheless.”

“Beautiful strain. Euphoric, uplifted, dream like days with this one. Really surprised me and took me back to younger days  lighting up. I usually prefer indicas but this one ticks the boxes. Perfect wake and bake. At night not knocking you out but mellows you nicely”
“Absolutely one of my favs. So many medicinal and psychoactive effects with almost zero negatives. An incredible strain that puts me exactly where I want to be.”
“wow! came on perfect! Not too hard but hard enough to feel that beautiful euphoria not to mention adding my headache stress level and muscle tension 💚 I lika this Strain💃”
“I loved this strain. BEAUTIFUL, CRYSTALLINE, HUGE,  SMELLY,  BUDS! Effect was perfect blend of Blue Dream and SATIVA euphoric energy!  7/10”
“Blue Dream x Star Dawg”
“I'm a newbie, but I did like how this made me feel.  Got super talkative when people were around and then calm, and energetic when alone.”

“I'm still relatively new into smoking recreationally, but I've tried to try out a bunch of different strains to know what I'm looking for.

This strain has been my favorite high yet! While it did dry out my mouth a bit more than usual I wasn't too worried about that. It gave me a good bit of energy and is one of the first strains I have had where I felt like I could go out and about and be productive on it. 

A lot o...”
“Mellow and relaxed after 3 tokes from a 4 glass pipe. Really enjoyable and smooth. A hint of sweet and coffee flavor on the exhale.”"
“Top 3 best strains for me! Taste of berry haze is amazing! Affordable!”
“wow this strain has it all from smell to taste to uplifting effects in seconds. this is a very potent strain with excellent results. 4 out of 5 as to feeling mild paranoia.”
“This strain for me was very good it gave me motivation for the day love it and MMEC fast delivery”
“Dream Star is by far my favorite strain. It makes me wildly creative, uplifted, and positive. It's great if you have depression.”
“I'd have to say its one of the best strains if ever had”
“A nice euphoric energy that makes everything enjoyable. It has very therapeutic effects for stress, depression, migraines, and pain.”
“I smoke before work and I love it. Such s happy smoke”
